pullRequest.title: #695 Check for direct assignment for iterable, stream or map types
pullRequest.bodyText:
Should be done on their type parameters instead of the types themselves.
I was updating our deep clone example to use the new functionality and realized that it is not working properly for collections.

beforeCommit.message: #695 Check for direct assignment for iterable, stream or map types should be done on their type parameters instead of the types themselves

afterCommit.message: #695 Check for direct assignment for iterable, stream or map types should be done on their type parameters instead of the types themselves
